    • Constructor Detail

      • EventGroup

        public EventGroup(boolean daemon,
                  @NotNull
                  Pauser pauser,
                  boolean binding,
                  int bindingCpuCore,
                  int bindingCpuReplication,
                  String name,
                  int concThreads)
        Create an EventGroup
        Parameters:
        daemon - whether to create threads as daemon
        pauser - pauser to use
        binding - whether to bind core event loop to current core
        bindingCpuCore - CPU to bind core event loop to. Supersedes binding above
        bindingCpuReplication - CPU to bind replication event loop to. -1 means no binding
        name - name of event group. Any created threads are named after this
